intro:
Experience the life of a shop manager
Keep shelves full and customers happy
Build your dream supermarket!
description:
Supermarket Simulator Store

Step into the world of retail and experience what it’s like to manage your very own supermarket!
In Supermarket Simulator, you’ll take control of every part of the store — from stocking shelves to serving customers — all in a realistic and fun 3D environment.

Order products, restock inventory, and organize shelves to keep your store running smoothly. Greet your customers, handle checkout transactions, and make sure everyone leaves happy. As your business grows, you’ll earn money to expand your store, upgrade equipment, and unlock new products.

Whether you love management games or just want to relax and build your dream shop, Supermarket Simulator offers a satisfying experience for all ages.

Features:

• Realistic 3D supermarket environment
• Stock shelves, scan items, and serve customers
• Manage inventory and balance your profits
• Upgrade your store and unlock new products
• Enjoy casual, relaxing gameplay suitable for all players

Are you ready to open the doors and become the best shop manager in town?
Your supermarket adventure starts now!
